quarters.title: Q3 2025
quarters.summary: Phase 2 kickoff focused on growth narratives and client engagement foundations.

entries.title: Waitlist funnel launch
entries.summary: Introduced a premium waitlist experience with guided copy, multi-step form, and CRM handoff automation.

entries.title: Public changelog hub groundwork
entries.summary: Scoping content architecture, interaction patterns, and release process for the public changelog hub.

quarters.title: Q4 2025
quarters.summary: Collaboration and governance initiatives move into delivery.

entries.title: Notification pipeline foundation
entries.summary: Queue-backed notification service with reusable email templates and webhook connectors.

entries.title: Client tagging framework
entries.summary: Role-aware tagging model to power filters, reporting, and personalized insights.
